definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
pinyin: huan2 jing4 ying3 xiang3 ping2 gu1

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate incision and fixation at different kinds of facial fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估不同類型頜面骨骨折的手術入路及固定方法。

sentences.english: To assess the effectiveness of cardiac compressions during adult cardiopulmonary resuscitation, the nurse should palpate which pulse site?
sentences.chinese: 心肺復甦時，評估按壓的有效性，應檢查哪處的脈搏？

sentences.english: He suggests establishing a trial period and a date for review.
sentences.chinese: 他建議設定一段試行期，並確定一個重新評估日期。

sentences.english: Second, adults should reappraise their priorities about what is important.
sentences.chinese: 其次，成年人應重新評估什麼事情對他們最重要。

sentences.english: Q12. Have GM products on the international market passed a risk assessment?
sentences.chinese: 國際市場上的轉基因產品是否已通過風險評估？

sentences.english: This assessment also influenced ELS' approach to growth going forward.
sentences.chinese: 這項評估同時也影響了ELS的向前增長的方式。

sentences.english: I get the program "running" I have noway of assessing its quality.
sentences.chinese: 在程序真正運行之前，沒有辦法評估其質量。

sentences.english: This helps the doctor estimate how long you have been pregnant and your due date.
sentences.chinese: 這可以幫助醫生評估你懷孕的日期以及預定產期。

sentences.english: Self-examination and assessment results show that the quality of data related to the work of full compliance.
sentences.chinese: 自查評估結果顯示，相關工作的數據質量全面達標。

sentences.english: The model of concert force provides a method of dimensional evaluation for the empirical succinctness.
sentences.chinese: 協調力模式給出了經驗簡潔性的量化評估方法。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the nephron spring surgery for renal neoplasms.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估保留腎單位手術治療腎腫瘤的效果。

sentences.english: The results supported the potential for using triage-based PDA systems at mass gatherings .
sentences.chinese: 評估結果顯示本系統在支援大型活動的潛在價值。

sentences.english: The following points are considered in evaluating the maturity of the integration layer.
sentences.chinese: 評估集成層的成熟度時應考慮以下幾點。

sentences.english: The performance of air traffic control system was evaluated by using Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP).
sentences.chinese: 針對管制中心系統，利用層次分析法評估其系統效能。

sentences.english: TOKO performs matching evaluation for all types of ICs.
sentences.chinese: 東光株式會社爲所有類型的IC進行匹配評估。

sentences.english: Objectire To summarize and evaluate the effect of surgical treatment on humeral intercondylar fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結評估手術治療肱骨髁間骨折的療效。

definition: to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
